intro.one: Web Developer Who Makes Technology Simple
intro.two: I help turn your ideas into websites and apps that actually work for your business.
intro.two-cn: 为创意人士提供高效、经济、自由的 Web 服务
intro.three:
Feeling overwhelmed by website technology? You're not alone.
I'm here to handle the technical stuff so you can focus on your business. Think of me as your friendly tech partner who speaks plain English and gets things done.
intro.four: Build human-centered technology that actually works.

about.title: About Panko Digital
about.body:
Panko Digital is your go-to web and application developer expert.


I make, or fix websites and apps that work perfectly for your business.

I eliminate confusing tech jargon and keep communication clear and simple.

I'm conscious about budgets and costs, keeping you informed every step of the way.

I've helped everyone from small startups to major brands get their digital presence right the first time.

I'm based in Geelong, Australia.

Mobile.techie: Custom mobile app development for iOS and Android with app store setup and user tracking
Mobile.creative: Mobile apps that your customers will love — simple, fast, and designed to help your business grow.

Games.techie: Quick game prototypes and interactive experiences with engaging user interfaces
Games.creative: Fun, engaging games and interactive experiences that keep users coming back for more

Cloud.techie: Scalable cloud hosting solutions with automatic backups and performance monitoring
Cloud.creative: Reliable online systems that grow with your business and keep your data safe and accessible

E-commerce.techie: Custom e-commerce development with payment processing and inventory management
E-commerce.creative: Online stores that make it easy for customers to buy from you — more sales, fewer abandoned carts

Signage.techie: Digital signage systems with content management and scheduling capabilities
Signage.creative: Eye-catching digital displays that get your message across clearly and grab attention

UX.techie: User experience design and prototyping with usability testing and iterative improvements
UX.creative: User-friendly design that puts your customers first -websites and apps that are easy to use and achieve your business goals

intro.four: 墨尔本、悉尼、吉朗自由电子商务、网络和移动软件应用程序开发人员.

about.title: 关于
about.body:
是一家针对计算机无法完成的零件的服务机构。


我们的重点是现实世界产品和尖端技术的交叉点。我们运用人工技术和分析，结合人工智能工具和软件工程最佳实践，为您的业务实现最佳系统。

让技术为您服务。我们在创建数字系统方面拥有数十年的经验。随之而来的是设计出有效、高效且具有成本效益的东西的能力。

panko 由人类运营，为人类服务…

E-commerce.creative: Shopify、Squarespace 或 Wix 商店管理

Signage.techie: 体育场和酒店场所的广播设计和标牌系统承包商。
Signage.creative: 具有内容管理功能的大屏幕显示系统
